name: en-US
indexGreeting: Welcome to Little Sheng Iv100 club
indexSlogan: Acquire premium accounts now and embark on your journey as a Pokémon master.
indexIntro1: It's best to look for trustworthy sellers, like Little Sheng Store.
Here's our sales record in Taiwan's famous game accounts platforms.
indexIntro2: Since completing our first Pokémon trade in 2019, we've been in business for over four years, with hundreds of transactions on record and counting.
We have received overwhelmingly positive reviews with a 99% positive rating. Little Sheng Exclusive is committed to offering the highest quality and safest accounts.
If you're thinking of diving into or returning to the world of Pokémon Go, choosing Little Sheng is a decision you won't regret!
indexDescription: Due to the fact that POGO API is no longer functional, we can only manually input account information one by one.
We do our best to avoid any errors, but there is still a chance that typos may be present in the account details, such as the level, Pokémon, inventory, or stardust amount, etc.
If you're not comfortable taking this risk, it's better not to purchase here.
We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience. ^_^
If you know of a smarter way to obtain account information, such as using a different API or some other method, please let us know. Thank you! <3
accountsInfo1: Want to start with a new account but always afraid of being hacked or receiving black mail?
With Little Sheng's accounts, you won't have to worry about these issues.
accountsInfo2: Welcome to the Iv100 Club, where only Pokémon with IV100 are listed. (Legendary Pokémon come with random IVs.)
Typically, accounts also include other random non-IV100 Pokémon or Shiny Pokémon, but due to technical issues, they are not all listed currently.
accountsTeamInfo: This means the account has free team, user could join team in any gym later
accountSubTitle: Check the Pokémon account detailed info and more IV100 pokemon.
accountSlogan: Equip yourself with a powerful Pokémon Go account in ruling the world.
Buy now and create history with team
searchPokemonsPlaceHolder: PokeName1/PokeName2/PokeName3...it could only be sepeated by this / symbol
cartPayButton: Only Skrill, BTC, or Taiwan payment available for now
cartPayTips1: To purchase any account, please contact our service agent for furthur process.
cartPayTips2: The website payment system is still under development.
